attributes.action: free cyprus and make this the greek island it has always been.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: please can you review this again, on the  19th October 2004 the last treaty organised was the 'annan plan' that had no relevance to those greek refugees who have lost their homes and and dignity,everything our forefathers left us. We are in the 21st century and this is the only segregated island in the world, and for me to visit my fathers house i must show my passport to go into the northern part of our island to hostile terrority with looks of filth by the Turks.This has been lingering for the last 40 years what is going to be done? we need to act fast, the longer we leave it the far worse the hatred remains in the next generation

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
